attributes.action: A vote of no confidence in the Scottish parliament and Nicola Sturgeon
attributes.background: Nicola Sturgeon is planning on stopping the UK quitting the eu. She also forgetting s the 48% of Scots who voted out and lies about the pound being kept if independent

rejection.details:
The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:


http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
